Detailed Description

Singleton type which tracks all occurrences of NewMemoryBlock.

This class is the only singleton global variable in Minion when in reenterant mode. It keeps track of all the occurrences of NewMemoryBlock so when a MoveablePointer is copied, it is possible to find which block it was from.
